com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common

Class AsyncTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.AsyncTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class AsyncTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A wrapper class around a Thread that can:
    - Create an infinite loop that can be stopped externally
    - Provide an error-free sleep function

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncTask()
      Initializes a new nameless Async task
      AsyncTask(java.lang.String name)
      Initializes a new named Async task
      AsyncTask(java.lang.String name, int priority)
      Initializes a new named and prioritized Async task
